channel.title: Need a recommendation
channel.description:
Well I've downloaded and messed with what seems like hundreds (I'm sure it's closer to dozens) of sources and they always seem to be lacking in some area, or are already over-coded for what I'm looking for.
Can anyone link me a source (with a client as well, pref) that has the essentials? (working teleports, bank booths, npcs, etc) I'm not a good enough coder to start from a complete scrap source, but I also want the source to be fairly clean so I can give it my own taste. Any and all replies are much appreciated.

item.title: Need a recommendation
item.dc:creator: @CarterInk CarterInk
item.description:
@CarterInk wrote:

prefer Project Insanity, but possibly one with a game frame changer or have it pushing a newer version? I’m not a fan of the old school setups.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a recommendation
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

What base and revision are you wanting?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a recommendation
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

You might want to download a base to your liking with a bunch of crap on it. And try to remove the stuff. I’m sorry I can’t help you more than that.

Read full topic
